lines.text: Mine!
[gesturing at Eva]
Take your filthy hands off me!

[grabbing Eva's hand]
For me!
Yes, she's for you.
A woman should do as she pleases, just like a man. You taught me that.
You must trust me, and you must obey me!
I will not obey you! I will not!
Don't provoke me, Eva!
I will provoke you!
I created your body, just as I created your mind. And I can uncreate it too.
The trouble with free women Charles, is they're free to despise us. It's a risk I find unacceptable.

[Seeing Viktor's scars]
Oh my... here's a man's been mistreated in his life.
What is 'dead'?
Sleeping... sleeping forever. One day we go to sleep and we don't wake up.
I don't think I could sleep that long.

You can do what you like! You can take apart the body you put together, you can take away the life you gave me, but you cannot have me. Not ever. Not even if you murder me and raise me up a thousand thousand times, you cannot have me.
You taught me out of books, but I have a life of my own.
You didn't create me! You didn't create ME!
As a matter of fact... I did.
